channel.title: [PI]A skill based upon a book
channel.description: Well, i know how to do everything to make a skill however, I don't know 1 thing. My skill I am making is gonna be based on a book. How can I make it so that, lets say, they turn a page and they get XP after they turn it. And btw, the book wont close after they get 1 level up, so no removeAllWindows().

item.title: [PI]A skill based upon a book
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“lurtz1230, post:6, topic:430232”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=532908.msg3895199#msg3895199 date=1327249935]
Well, i know how to do everything to make a skill however, I don’t know 1 thing. My skill I am making is gonna be based on a book. How can I make it so that, lets say, they turn a page and they get XP after they turn it. And btw, the book wont close after they get 1 level up, so no removeAllWindows().
[/quote]

Hers a tutorial on how to get books to work, wouldnt be hard at all to add experience everytime someone clicks the next page button.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431556.0.html

I not wasting my take making a skil that you lvl u by turning pages

Now come on, be a little positive.[/quote]

Thanks, however one question. Would the code be like this:

                case 839: //Previous Button
                        if(p.page == X) {// page number
                                p.bookX();//book void
                        }

                break;
                case 841: //Next Button
                        if(p.page == X) {//page number
                                p.bookX();//Book void
			        c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.JAVA_EXPERIENCE, c.playerJava);
                                break;
                        }
                break;
                case 10162: //Close Window Button
                        p.RemoveAllWindows();//Remove the interface from the screen
                        p.page = 0;//Sets the page back to 0
                        p.outStream.createFrame(1); // Stops the animation, period
                        p.updateRequired = true;//updates current player status
                        p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;//updates player character animation to other peoples client
                break;

I added c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.JAVA_EXPERIENCE, c.playerJava); to case 841. Of course, I need t describe c, but besides that, would this work?

Read full topic
